root: ^Naomi enters the bar. It is dark, dusty, and empty, but otherwise in fairly good condition. She explores the bar, and eventually comes across a strange humanoid machine standing lifeless behind the bar: L-KRON 385, the bar's sentient automaton. Naomi gets close. L-KRON powers up, stutters and whirrs a bit, then settles down and turns to face her.
^Oh! I do apologize for startling you, Mistress Steele. I beg you forgive my manners.
^Very well, Ms. Naomi. Yes, I am aware of your existence. Master Steele... I mean, your father, has informed me all about you.
^Oh! I do beg your pardon for my insolence. I am L-KRON 385, a helper automaton built for automating tasks in hospitality establishments.
^Can I just call you "L" for short?
^Very well, Ms. Naomi. "L" is an acceptable shorthand.
^Wonderful! So, L, how do I get started running this place?
^There is much to go through. Fortunately, we do have enough time to go over the basics before we open for the day, if you so desire.
